title: Endive, Apple & Walnut Salad With Roquefort
summary: Endive, Apple & Walnut Salad With Roquefort might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains about 7g of protein, 25g of fat, and a total of 270 calories. This gluten free, primal, and vegetarian recipe serves 6 and costs $1.84 per serving. 18 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of walnut oil, flat-leaf parsley leaves, pepper, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 67%. This score is solid. Try Chicory-Endive Roquefort and Walnut Salad, Apple, Walnut, And Endive Salad, and Apple, Walnut, and Endive Salad for similar recipes.
